name: Trendy Body Spa: Treatment And Massage
name_original: Trendy Body Spa: Treatment And Massage
description:
Does your little girl love educational games and want to be a beautician ?
If your daughter want to play in the best Spa you have found the right educational game !
Every princess likes to go to massage parlors to relax the body !
The Girl want to take a bath, a full-body massage, then a skin spa !
Completely relax yourself, so that you become the most beautiful girl !
Play in this fabulous spa center for unforgettable moments of total relaxation !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the fairytale world of princesses.

Trendy Body Spa & Massage is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose Levels
* give a relaxing full body massage
* in the Back SPA you can give a healing hot stone massage
* massage with oils, emulsion to give amazing relaxation massage session
* give a leg massage
* relax and shaving legs
* tap the arrow button to change scene

Can you help this adorable princess in this spa game ?
If your toddler loves to play with the princesses this is the best beauty salon game for your child.
Let's go to this famous Back SPA shop, enjoy a comfortable massage and experience the royal treatment.

Trendy Body Spa & Massage is a must have app for little girls.

Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old, perfect for girls of all ages
-Optimized for Apple (iPad , iPhone, etc)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-Try on incredible massage techniques and oil massage
-Learn how to make a fabulous relaxation massage in this cute spa game

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination in this fashion game!
Play with the best Makeover game and salon games, become the prettiest masseuse fashion princess in the world!

Have fun! Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids.
